document_data.mainbody:
Tav was an adventurer and detective in Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
In the , Tav began investigating the murder of an elf, whose body was found on Sailors Crossing in Eastway. After unraveling a larger plot, a letter from Sceleritas Fel threatened Tav with death if they failed to identify the killer, whom Sceleritas Fel identified as his master. The letter gave Tav a time limit of a tenday to complete the task. This threat was carried out by the Dark Urge, a white dragonborn and Bhaalspawn.
